content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 
Connected to chests at positions (x=43.5, y=-82.5), (x=40.5, y=-80.5), (x=43.5, y=-81.5)

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)
Consists of lab (position x=0.5, y=2.5) connected to power network with ElectricityGroup(id=4095)

### Inserter and chest system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) and chest at position (x=2.5, y=0.5)

### Inserter and chest system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) and chest at position (x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure there are no existing objects in the way before placing entities
- Ensure the terrain is placeable (not water) before placing entities

### Errors when getting entities
- Ensure the entity exists at the specified position before trying to get it

### Errors when researching technologies
- Ensure the lab has power before trying to research technologies

### Errors when connecting to power network
- Ensure the lab is connected to a valid power network before trying to research technologies

### Errors when refueling entities
- Ensure the entity can be refueled before trying to refuel it

### Errors when inserting items
- Ensure the inserter has a valid source and destination before trying to insert items
